item.title: The Best Non-American Zombie Movie Of All Time Is This Terrifying Horror With 95% On Rotten Tomatoes
item.description: Train to Busan has earned unwavering critical acclaim over the years and is widely considered to be the best non-American zombie movie ever made.

item.title: "I Won't Be Doing That:" Rosamund Pike Recalls Being Asked To Undress During James Bond Audition
item.description: While Rosamund Pike got her start as Miranda Frost in Die Another Day, she recently stated had to deny an uncomfortable request during her audition.

item.title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning Review: Should You Accept Tom Cruise's Final Mission?
item.description: Tom Cruise is back in theaters with Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning, but should you make a trip to theaters to see Ethan's latest adventure?
